channel.title: PLEASE HELP! How do you add a Spec Attack to weapon?!
channel.description:
Im fairly new to coding so I have no clue on where to go or w/e I want to add spec attacks on stat hammer ID = 6999 Also on vesta long ID = 7000 Also on Dragon claws ID = 8002 Also on Barek GS = 14492
If someone could help me it would be very much appreaciated!! thanks so much !!! :D
